item.description:
I WILL NOT BE AT THIS FUNDRAISER - MAKE YOUR OWN RESERVATIONS! I suggest you mention that you'd like to sit with others from Ethnic Dining when you make your reservation.

TAKE A TRIP AROUND THE WORLD WITH CHEFS FOR JIMMY

Presented by: Winer Levsky Group of UBS Financial Services Inc.

The 19th annual Chefs for Jimmy event to benefit the Jimmy Fund and Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, featuring a variety of delicious dishes from around the world prepared by 30 local restaurants, will be held on Friday, Jan. 23 at Chez Josef in Agawam, MA.

Tickets are $75 and are available by calling:
(888) 546-6938,
or online at "www.jimmyfund.org/chefs-for-jimmy". This year the Chefs for Jimmy event is being held in memory of Neal Webber.

When: Friday, Jan. 23, 2009
6:30 p.m.â€“ 9:30 p.m.

Where: Chez Josef
176 Shoemaker Lane
Agawam, MA 01001

For more info, please feel free to email Kristin at Kristin_Kacewicz@dfci.harvard.
edu and reference that you are with the Ethnic Dining Group.
item.how_to_find_us: Make your own reservation, I will not be there!

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Chez Josef - Jimmy Fund benefit dinner (on your own)
